name: Space Papers Please
description:
A VR project designed and developed in 4 weeks (2 days a week) in a team of 8 as a collborative assignment at AIE.

This game was heavily inspired by "Papers Please" and was designed and produced in a 4 week time frame. Given the 4 week time frame, some art and audio assets are from Unity Asset Store packs and there is no tutorial included.

Known Compatible with Oculus Rift S and Oculus Quest 2.

Instructions:

  • Compare the Visa Data with the Ship's Database
  • Determine if the subject is carrying cargo to a planet that restricts such goods
  • Check the Visa's purpose against current travel restrictions on the destination planet
  • Press the Green button to grant admittance or press the Red button to deny access.

Hints:

  • The table holding planets can be interacted with by moving the controller into a planet.
  • The UI screens can be interacted with by using the primary button on your controller (A or X on Oculus Touch)
  • Slam the Red and Green buttons down by slamming the buttons down. :)

The Team:

DesignersProgrammersArtistsJayden SjobergZachary Rimmer (Me)Harlow RenshawJoel FortierAlex BondarchukViet Vuong Hoai PhanBenjamin KellyJordan Brewin
